question_text:
Question 1
Mr. X speaks ______ Japanese ________Chinese.
(A) either/nor 
(B) also/but
(C) neither/nor 
(D) neither/or
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
“either” is used with “or”
“neither” is used with “nor”
Because of these fixed combinations option (A) and option (D) are eliminated.
Option (B), in this option we are not getting contrast tone in given filler that’s why this option is also 
eliminated.
Hence, the correct option is (C).
